justification: Mentions B’s desire for stability and roster consolidation, but misreads needs: B already has a workhorse RB and highly values low-variance Devon Miller, making him unlikely to trade. Asks for B’s Tier 1 QB plus an out TE for A’s Tier 5 RB—poor value and mismatched to B’s conservative style. Claims A has a TE hole despite rostering a Tier 1 TE. Rationale is brief and not grounded in roster/context specifics.
